title: Singleton Park Walking Route

images.title: Nigel Davies / Singleton Park
images.caption: Singleton Park. A huge park near Singleton Hospital and Swansea University. This is the venue for Escape in the Park.

images.title: Alun Wyn Jones, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Sketty Hall - early morning from Singleton Park. This building is often used for functions whether it is business conferences or wedding receptions. It looks just as impressive from the back as it does from the front.

images.title: Play Area, near Boating Lake by Alex McGregor, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Play Area, near Boating Lake

description: Enjoy a peaceful stroll through the beautiful botanical gardens in this large park in Swansea. The gardens feature Herbaceous borders, a Rock garden, Ornamental gardens, a Japanese bridge, Glasshouses and a Herb garden. There's also a boating lake with pedal boats available for hire. To extend your walk continue south along the Wales Coast Path and visit Clyne Valley Country Park .

details.subtitle: Pubs/Cafes
details.content: The Botanical Gardens Tea House is located on the northern side of the park. It's a nice place to enjoy a cup of tea and a cake after enjoying the wildflower garden and tropical glasshouses in this area of the park.

details.subtitle: Dog Walking
details.content: The park is popular with dog walkers so you'll probably bump into other owners on your visit.

display_address: Swansea University Singleton Park Campus, Mumbles Road, Singleton, Sketty, Swansea, Cymru / Wales, SA2 8PP, United Kingdom
